data.actual_result: The emoji code, :emojiname: is displayed in the title without showing the actual emoji
data.expected_result: The emoji code should be displayed as an emoji
data.short_description: Emojis do not display properly in embed titles but they do on PC
data.steps_to_repro: -  to know how 2. Check out the docs and figure out how to send an embed message and in the title put an emoji such as 1⃣ or 😆 or something. 3. Go on Discord Android to the message and Observe
